label: VerifiableCredential
comment: A cryptographically verifiable set of claims about a product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique identifier assigned to the credential, typically formatted as a URI of the stored credential.
A unique identifier of the entity that issued the credential. Typically expessed as a DID.
The current status of the credential, represented by a specific code.
The ProductPassport object that the credential pertains to.
The ISO-8601 date time from which the credential is valid.
